nodes.bodyText: Should we remove this main method?
If I removed main method, mvn clean install will report Unused field Error.
It should be removed - we don't want users to run this so I can't see why we would include it.
Already remoted. Thank you for your check. 🙇
Do we really need this assertion here?
Original code have nonnull check. So I added it, too. Just to keep original logic: https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/pull/12272/files#diff-dcea63cea0abf12a61a1e614cf899b43L204
